description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget in a Flutter application, which displays a scrollable screen with an app bar and some introductory text.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that builds the main home screen layout with a CustomScrollView, SliverAppBar, and introductory text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, including a gradient, a pinned app bar, and welcome text.
